name: Amazon Rainforest Conservation Tour
description: Join conservation experts to learn about rainforest protection efforts and support indigenous communities.

name: Coral Reef Restoration Experience
description: Help marine biologists restore coral reefs using sustainable techniques. Includes reef-safe snorkeling.

name: Sustainable Vineyard Tour
description: Visit vineyards practicing organic farming, renewable energy use, and innovative water conservation techniques.

name: Wildlife Sanctuary Volunteer Day
description: Spend a day helping at a wildlife sanctuary that rehabilitates injured and orphaned animals for release.
